title: Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA) Implementation
description: As a user, I want multi-factor authentication, so that I can protect my account with an additional layer of security.
attributes_and_rules: MFA setup and verification, OTP generation and validation, backup codes
acceptance_criteria: Users can enable MFA via settings; Users receive OTP via SMS/email; Users can verify OTP to complete login
test_cases: Given a user with MFA enabled, When they attempt to login, Then they should receive an OTP for verification

title: Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) Implementation
description: As an admin, I want to set role-based access controls, so that I can limit user access based on authorization levels.
attributes_and_rules: User roles, Permission assignments, Role inheritance
acceptance_criteria: Admins can assign roles to users; Users have access based on their roles; Access logs capture authorization checks
test_cases: Given a user with a specific role, When they attempt to access restricted resources, Then their permissions should be verified and access granted/denied accordingly

title: Dashboard Overview of Financial Products
description: As a customer, I want a dashboard overview of my financial products, so that I can view my account summaries and relevant services.
attributes_and_rules: Account summaries, Financial product details, Personalized services
acceptance_criteria: Customers see an overview of their financial products on the dashboard; Account summaries are updated in real time
test_cases: Given a logged-in customer, When they access the dashboard, Then they should see a summary of their financial products

title: Responsive Mobile-First Design
description: As a user, I want a responsive mobile-first design, so that I can access the portal seamlessly from any device.
attributes_and_rules: Responsive layout, Mobile-first design strategy, Cross-device compatibility
acceptance_criteria: The portal layout adapts to various screen sizes; Usability and performance are consistent across devices
test_cases: Given any device, When a user accesses the portal, Then the layout should adjust responsively to provide a consistent user experience

epic_title: Digital Account Opening and Service Request Workflows
title: Online Account Opening Workflow
description: As a customer, I want a digital account opening workflow, so that I can open new accounts online without visiting a branch.
attributes_and_rules: Digital forms, Automated data validation, Integration with backend services
acceptance_criteria: Customers can complete account opening forms online; Data is validated and submitted automatically
test_cases: Given a new customer, When they fill out the account opening form, Then the form should validate the inputs and create the account

epic_title: Document Upload and Application Draft Management
title: Secure Document Upload
description: As a user, I want to securely upload documents, so that I can submit necessary files through the portal.
attributes_and_rules: Secure file upload, Encryption methods, Storage protocols
acceptance_criteria: Users can upload documents securely; Documents are encrypted during upload and storage
test_cases: Given an active user session, When the user uploads a document, Then the document should be stored securely with encryption

title: Real-Time Status Notifications
description: As a customer, I want real-time status notifications, so that I can track the progress of my requests.
attributes_and_rules: Live status updates, Email notifications, In-platform alerts
acceptance_criteria: Users receive real-time notifications for status changes; Notifications are sent via email and in-platform
test_cases: Given an open service request, When the request status changes, Then the user should receive a notification via email and in-platform alert

title: Detailed Interaction History
description: As a customer, I want access to my interaction history, so that I can review my past activities on the portal.
acceptance_criteria: Customers can view their interaction history; Activity logs are detailed and traceable
test_cases: Given a customer, When they access their interaction history, Then they should be able to see a detailed log of their past activities

title: Real-Time Data Synchronization with Core Banking
description: As a user, I want real-time data synchronization with the core banking system, so that I can have up-to-date account information.
acceptance_criteria: Data in the portal is synchronized with the core banking system in real-time; No latency in data updates
test_cases: Given changes in account data, When the data is updated in the core banking system, Then it should reflect in the portal in real-time

title: High-Performance Database Implementation
description: As a user, I want a high-performance database, so that the portal operates smoothly even under heavy user traffic.
acceptance_criteria: Database performance meets scalability requirements; Portal operations are unaffected by user load
test_cases: Given high user traffic, When multiple operations are performed, Then the database should deliver consistent performance without lag

epic_title: Data Security, Compliance, and Encryption Framework
title: Advanced Data Encryption Mechanisms
description: As a security officer, I want advanced data encryption, so that sensitive information is secure and compliance is maintained.
attributes_and_rules: Data encryption, Regulation compliance, Continuous monitoring
acceptance_criteria: Data at rest and in transit is encrypted; Regular audits confirm compliance with security standards
test_cases: Given sensitive data, When it is stored or transmitted, Then it should be protected through advanced encryption mechanisms
